Summary: brother inlaw and i werd camping when witnessed what we both thought was a satalite. but satalites and planes dont stop start to decent and stop again. then hover and then flash to your maglite flashlight and interchanging beam headlamp.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI wont go into detail on my experience. instead i want to ask MUFON if they have ever heard of Wormhole Displacement?
trends: There has been one other sighting in Yampa
